import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; const StudentPage = () => { return (

Interview Portal

Check Your Email

We've sent you an invitation email with a secure link to select your interview slot. Please check your inbox and click on the "Select Interview Slot" button.

Can't find the email? Check your spam folder or contact HR for assistance.
); }; export default StudentPage;
